snippet: In what appears to be a recurring 15-year cycle, the compound annual return of the S.& P. stock index peaks at more than 15 percent, then plunges. It’s plunge time.
abstract: Floyd Norris Off the Charts column holds that In what appears to be a recurring 15-year cycle, the compound annual return of the Standard & Poor's stock index peaks at more than 15 percent, then plunges; holds if the past is prologue, the 15-year return is likely to continue to decline and to turn negative in about four years.
lead_paragraph: In what appears to be a recurring 15-year cycle, the compound annual return of the S.& P. stock index peaks at more than 15 percent, then plunges. It’s plunge time.

headline.print_headline: A Historical Cycle Bodes Ill For the Markets
headline.seo: A Historical Cycle Bodes Ill for the Markets
headline.main: A Historical Cycle Bodes Ill for the Markets
